            <div class="banner-message"><div class="message-wrapper" id="banner_general_message_1">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12">
            <h2 class="message-header A-TYP22L-RW-ALL">Beware of Phishing SMS</h2>
            <button class="close-message-button" data-message-id="29c471c83c">
                <span class="icon icon-delete" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="visuallyhidden"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! <a href="/help/cybersecurity-and-fraud/phishing/">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Risk Profiling Questionnaire presents a number of different factors which assess your willingness to take on investment risk. Across the questions, you will be assigned a risk tolerance which matches your investment risk preferences, out of six different risk tolerance levels as defined below:<br> </p>

            ">
    
    
        
        <table class="desktop">
            <caption>
                
    
    
    

















                
    
    
    














<div class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL text-container text ">
    
    
        
        Risk Profiling Questionnaire
    
</div>


                
            </caption>
            <thead><tr>
 <th scope="col">Risk tolerance</th>
 <th scope="col">Definition</th>
</tr></thead>
            <tbody><tr>
 <td>Secure</td>
 <td><ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
   <li>You generally do not want to take any investment risk, since you can accept no investment loss.</li>
   <li>Financial products with an investment element are not suitable for you.</li>
   <li>Products that are potentially suitable for you are likely to produce returns that are based on prevailing interest rates which may or may not keep pace with inflation.</li>
  </ul></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Very Cautious<br></td>
 <td><ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
   <li>You are generally comfortable with achieving <strong>minimal</strong> level of return potential on your investment coupled with minimal risks.</li>
   <li>Capital values of products that are potentially suitable for you can fluctuate and may fall below your original investment. In normal market conditions fluctuation is expected to be minimal (although this is not guaranteed), and you are comfortable with this level of fluctuation.</li>
   <li>Investment products with risk rating 1 are likely to be suitable for you.</li>
  </ul></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Cautious<br></td>
 <td><ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
   <li>You are generally comfortable with achieving a <strong>low</strong> level of return potential on your investment coupled with a low level of risk.</li>
   <li>Capital values of products that are potentially suitable for you can fluctuate and may fall below your original investment. In normal market conditions fluctuation is expected to be low (although this is not guaranteed), and you are comfortable with this level of fluctuation.</li>
   <li>Investment products with risk rating 2 or below are likely to be suitable for you.</li>
  </ul></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Balanced<br></td>
 <td><ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
   <li>You are generally comfortable with achieving a <strong>moderate</strong> level of return potential on your investment coupled with a moderate level of risk.</li>
   <li>Capital values can fluctuate and may fall below your original investment. Fluctuation is expected to be higher than products that are suitable for investors in lower risk tolerance categories, but not as much as for higher risk tolerance categories.</li>
   <li>Investment products with risk rating 3 or below are likely to be suitable for you.</li>
  </ul></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Adventurous<br></td>
 <td><ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
   <li>You are generally comfortable with achieving a <strong>high</strong> level of return potential on your investment coupled with high level of risk.</li>
   <li>Capital values can fluctuate significantly and may fall quite substantially below your original investment. You understand the risk/reward equation, and are comfortable with this level of fluctuation.</li>
   <li>Investment products with risk rating 4 or below are likely to be suitable for you.</li>
  </ul></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Speculative<br></td>
 <td><ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
   <li>You are generally comfortable with <strong>maximizing</strong> your return potential on investment coupled with maximized risk.</li>
   <li>Capital values can fluctuate widely and may fall substantially below your original investment. You understand the risk/reward equation, and are comfortable with this level of fluctuation.</li>
   <li>Investment products with risk rating 5 or below are likely to be suitable for you.</li>
  </ul></td>
</tr></tbody>
        </table>
    
</div>

 <th scope="col"><strong>Descriptions</strong><br></th>

 <td>Products with NO investment risk<br></td>
 <td>The product has no investment element and hence no price volatility.<br></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Low (1)<br></td>
 <td>Minimal chance of losing a significant portion of your capital over the term of the investment (although this is not guaranteed). Expected to demonstrate minimal price fluctuations over short periods of time.<br></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Low to Medium (2)<br></td>
 <td>Low chance of losing a significant portion of your capital over the term of the investment (although this is not guaranteed). Expected to demonstrate moderately low level of price fluctuations over short periods of time.<br></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Medium (3)<br></td>
 <td>Moderate chance of losing a significant portion of your capital over the term of the investment (although this is not guaranteed). Expected to demonstrate moderate level of price fluctuations over short periods of time.<br></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>Medium to High (4)<br></td>
 <td>Moderately high chance of losing a significant portion of your capital over the term of the investment. Expected to demonstrate moderately high level of price fluctuations over short periods of time.<br></td>
</tr>
<tr>
 <td>High (5)<br></td>
 <td>High chance of losing a significant portion of your capital over the term of the investment. Expected to demonstrate high level of price fluctuations over short periods of time.<br></td>
</tr></tbody>
